Plan: 1 to modify.

Summary by type:
  materialized views: 1 to modify

Materialized views:
  ~ user_summary
    + idx_user_summary_created_at (index)

DDL to be executed:
--------------------------------------------------

-- Transaction Group #1
CREATE INDEX CONCURRENTLY IF NOT EXISTS idx_user_summary_created_at ON user_summary (created_at);

-- Transaction Group #2
-- pgschema:wait
SELECT 
    COALESCE(i.indisvalid, false) as done,
    CASE 
        WHEN p.blocks_total > 0 THEN p.blocks_done * 100 / p.blocks_total
        ELSE 0
    END as progress
FROM pg_class c
LEFT JOIN pg_index i ON c.oid = i.indexrelid
LEFT JOIN pg_stat_progress_create_index p ON c.oid = p.index_relid
WHERE c.relname = 'idx_user_summary_created_at';
